articles.title: 17-year-old Indian invents groundbreaking tech that may help Alzheimer's patients - Editorji

articles.content: A 17-year-old Indian prodigy from Hyderabad has invented a device which, he claims, can detect when people with Alzheimer’s fall or wander off. Hemesh Chadalavada, a self-confessed nerd, made the gad… [+1926 chars]
